WorkItem.Description:
So I have attached a screenshot showing the stats of my UI (Left) and the armory (middle) and then to the right is what has imported from the Battle.net using the offline version of Rawr.
 
The stats are a bit off and does set me off thinking I have done something wrong myself. Just want to know if this is an issue or something that rawr does with calculations.
 
And for information I have my rawr set to unbuffed but it doesn't make a difference.
WorkItem.Summary: (Prot Warrior)Rawr says different stats then armory?

Comments.Message: I have the same problem with my Prot Pally. I was getting ready to optimize her with the new gear and realized the stats were way off. I didn't change anything after I imported her from Armory. Gear, gems, and enchants are all correct. She's unbuffed in all 3. The base stats are correct, but not defensive. Help?
